patterns: tell me more about computer engineering cpe
responses: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering (BSCpE)  a four-year trimestral degree that aims to produce certified computer engineers. It embodies the science and technology of design, development, implementation, maintenance, and integration of softw and hardw components in modern computing systems and computer-controlled equipment.

Specializations covered by this program include the following: Embedded systems technology, System and network administration, Computing algorithm, Softw development and design (including mobile application development), Internet-of-Things (IoT), Machine learning, Robotics technology, Robotics Process Automation (RPA)

The Bachelor of Science in Electronics Engineering (BS ECE)  a four-year trimestral degree program which aims to produce certified electronics engineers who can conceptualize, design, and implement innovative electronic, computer, and communication systems, devices, goods, services, and processes.
